JobFullDesc: Do you enjoy designing & building full-stack products that provide value to our Enterprise customers? Are you excited about building innovative technologies that protect our customers from cybersecurity threats? Do you thrive in a collaborative & a data-driven environment? Do you enjoy working with talented software engineers, program managers, data scientists and security researchers? We are part of Microsoft’s  Security and Compliance (S+C) division - a collaborative, fast growing, and fun group with a startup mindset. Our mission is to help protect our customers with truly innovative cybersecurity technologies. We are committed to defending Microsoft customers from cyber-attacks as well as providing sophisticated capabilities for securing important devices & data.  Making our customers succeed with our solutions is what excites us every day! Our team has people from a wide variety of backgrounds, prior work & life experiences, and we are eager to maintain and grow that diversity. We foster a strong culture of learning & a collaborative work-environment. We are building numerous end-user facing cybersecurity applications & services for Enterprise & Consumer customers. Our products offer intuitive and easy-to-use UX that delight our customers. Our cloud services leverage Big Data and employ the latest advancements in AI/ML. Key product lines built by our division include world’s leading Anti-Virus, the Microsoft Defender Antivirus (AV), and Advanced Threat Protection (ATP) solutions. Our products and services are foundational drivers for Microsoft 365, and are a major growth opportunity for Microsoft. ResponsibilitiesWe are looking for a Software Engineer to join a team of talented Software Engineers working on full-stack product capabilities. Key responsibilities include the following.Implementation of full-stack features/services that are scalable, highly-available, compliant, and deployed globally via CI/CDParticipate in all-aspects of the engineering life-cycle including project planning, designing and implementing featuresSupport and help team members grow, building an inclusive team environment where everyone can deliver their best workAdvocate for and maintain a culture of high-quality software developmentPartner closely with our Program Management, Security Research & Data Science teamsHelp the team meet related engineering & business goalsQualifications Requirements:2+ years of industry-experience building/delivering high-quality software. Proven track record of shipping commercially successful software products & servicesBS, MS, or PhD degree in Computer Science, Mathematics, Engineering or related fields Preferred Qualifications : Excellent communication skills and ability to collaborate within a multi-disciplinary teamExperience building full-stack features & cloud servicesExpertise in C#, Java, C++or equivalent programming languagesExperience with Open Source Big Data Stack such as Hadoop, HIVE, SPARK, HBASE etc.Experience using agile methodologies Familiar with Secure Software Development Life Cycle  Ability to meet Microsoft, customer and/or government security screening requirements are required for this role.
